thread.title: Chelsea's Eden Hazard scoresr stunning goal
thread.title_full: Chelsea's Eden Hazard scoresr stunning goal

author: USA TODAY
title: Chelsea's Eden Hazard scoresr stunning goal
text:
Chelsea's Eden Hazard scoresr stunning goal Eden Hazard did it all on his own on Saturday. Just look at this insane potential Goal of the... Post to Facebook Chelsea's Eden Hazard scoresr stunning goal Eden Hazard did it all on his own on Saturday. Just look at this insane potential Goal of the...  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/chelsea-eden-hazard-amazing-goal-arsenal-antonio-conte-reaction-epl-video/   Chelsea's Eden Hazard scoresr stunning goal Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 9:58   
Chelsea's Eden Hazard, right avoids a tackle by Arsenal's Shkodran Mustafi during the English Premier League soccer match between Chelsea and Arsenal at Stamford Bridge stadium in London, Saturday, Feb. 4, 2017. (AP Photo/Kirsty Wigglesworth) ORG XMIT: XAG144 (Photo: AP) 
Eden Hazard did it all on his own on Saturday. 
Just look at this insane potential Goal of the Year, thanks to the Chelsea midfielder, who just ran circles around Arsenal defenders before putting up his squad 2-0: IT'S A WONDER GOAL from Eden Hazard! The Belgian can't be stopped on his way to doubling @ChelseaFC 's lead vs. Arsenal. #PLonNBC pic.twitter.com/I8rNJZXYrr â€” NBC Sports Soccer (@NBCSportsSoccer) February 4, 2017 
How incredible was it? Manager Antonio Conte ran into the crowd to celebrate gleefully. When your manager celebrates like this, you know you did a GREAT job. #Chelsea #PLonNBC pic.twitter.com/m7jfsvTAp9 
It totally deserved that reaction.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/chelsea-eden-hazard-amazing-goal-arsenal-antonio-conte-reaction-epl-video/ Most Popular
